title: Swap hero logo to new generated CCPG logo asset

requirements.summary: Add the new generated CCPG logo asset and update only the HeroSection top-of-page logo to reference it while keeping responsive sizing.
acceptanceCriteria: A new logo image derived from the uploaded "CCPG logo.png" exists under frontend/public/assets/generated with the filename specified in this build request.
HeroSection renders the new generated logo image at the very top of the page (the centered logo/wordmark block).
No other logos/images elsewhere in the app are changed as part of this update.
The hero logo remains responsive and visually aligned (keeps h-12 w-auto on mobile and sm:h-16 on larger screens or equivalent sizing behavior).

file_operations.description: Add the generated square black-and-white CCPG brand logo on a white background (derived from the uploaded "CCPG logo.png") as a static public asset.

Replace the hero logo img src from /assets/generated/ccpg-logo-transparent.dim_512x128.png to /assets/generated/ccpg-logo-top.dim_512x512.png, keeping existing responsive sizing classes (h-12 w-auto sm:h-16) and changing no other images or layout.
